body_html:
I think it is pretty clear that there are many people interested in this issue. However, I would suggest users to use the Subscribe button instead of adding a new 👍.

This way developers (and all subscribed users) can get notifications on useful future updates. 😉

PS: If you already posted a 👍 you might as well consider removing it to keep the discussion cleaner.
body_text:
I think it is pretty clear that there are many people interested in this issue. However, I would suggest users to use the Subscribe button instead of adding a new 👍.

PS: If you already posted a 👍 you might as well consider removing it to keep the discussion cleaner.
body:
I think it is pretty clear that there are many people interested in this issue. However, I would suggest users to use the <kbd>Subscribe</kbd> button instead of adding a new :+1:.

![screenshot from 2015-11-10 10-36-53](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/526577/11058980/2644a5da-8797-11e5-8761-da311f8b3774.png)

This way developers (and all subscribed users) can get notifications on _useful_ future updates. :wink:

_PS: If you already posted a :+1: you might as well consider removing it to keep the discussion cleaner._
